name: MLTextClassifier.FeatureExtractorType
desc: The feature extractors that are available to train a text classifier using transfer learning.

items.name: case dynamicEmbedding
items.desc: A feature extractor that provides embeddings for words, based on their in-context use.

items.name: case customEmbedding(URL)
items.desc: A feature extractor that uses an embedding you provide, contained within a model file.

items.name: case staticEmbedding
items.desc: A feature extractor that uses the standard, built-in word embeddings.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of a feature extractor type.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the feature extractor type thatâ€™s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the feature extractor type shown in a playground.
